caseTitle: Syed Raza Hussain Bukhari v. The State through D.A.G. & another
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Grant of post arrest bail on the ground of delay in the conclusion of trial in respect of offences under the Banks (Special Courts) Ordinance, 1984. Scope and extent of section 5(6) of the said Ordinance and the constitutional jurisdiction of the High Court to grant bail.
